title: About
text: I am currently a PhD candidate in Economics at IRES (UCLouvain) and teaching assistant at FOPES (UCLouvain). My research focuses on the economics of inequality: I am currently working on the evolution of income inequality in Belgium, within the Distributional National Accounts framework. I also teach two courses at the Haute École ISFSC in Brussels.

title: Nabil Sheikh Hassan
text:
I am currently a PhD student in Economics at IRES (UCLouvain) and a teaching assistant at FOPES (UCLouvain). My research focuses on the economics of inequalities: I am currently working on quantifying the evolution of income inequalities in Belgium, using Distributional National Accounts. I also teach a course at the Haute École ISFSC in Brussels.
  






About me, my interests, and my work as a researcher..
